Name: Cream Soda Cocktail
Ingredients: 30 ml Light white rum (charcoal-filtered 1-4 years old)
Instructions: SHAKE first 3 ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with lemonade.
Review: An alcoholic cream soda created for a friend who expressed a desire for just such a thing.
Nutrition: One serving of Cream Soda Cocktail contains 196 calories
